## General info
A simple & quick mailer using gmail as a host
	
## Technologies
Project is created with:
* Express
* Nodemailer
* cli-color
* prompt
	
## Setup
To run this project, install it locally using npm:
```
$ npm install easy-gmailer
$ var eg = require('easy-gmailer');
```
To send email
```
$ eg.sendmail();
```
